attributes.action: Reduce gender inequality in the work place.
attributes.additional_details: On average women are paid 30% less than men annually. Overall in a woman's lifetime they are paid £300,000  less than men.
attributes.background: In the workplace women are not treated as equals. Women have the same skills as men and in some cases are better for the job. However they are not given the job because of their gender. This is a problem because women will be more likely to not enjoy their job and they will get paid less.

rejection.details:
It's clear that you're concerned about the gender pay gap, but not clear what action you would like to see. The Government recently announced new measures to address the gender pay gap:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/pm-announces-new-measures-to-eradicate-gender-pay-inequality

If you would like the Government or Parliament to take different or additional action, you could start a petition calling for that.
